title: Detritus
author: Detritus
created_time: September 07, 2022, 06:27:36 PMLast edit: September 08, 2022, 07:31:18 PM by Detritus
content: Can anyone loan me $300 I will offer 1 BNB as coleteral I need the loan for 90 days Loan purpose; for business use Please if anyone is interested, state your interest rate. Thanks       ............................................................................... ....I thank the members who tried to help me with the loan request, I decided to update this thread today to inform those that tried to loan me that I have gotten a cash loan from a relative. Thanks to you all.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Detritus on September 07, 2022, 06:27:36 PM Can anyone loan me $300 I will offer 1 BNB as coleteral I need the loan for 90 days Loan purpose; for business use Please if anyone is interested, state your interest rate. Thanks 1 BNB costs 268.96 as of right now.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Any chance you can sign a message from this address that (he'hem) you posted in 2011?Quote from: Detritus on July 17, 2011, 07:53:39 PM1D48JXC8hMZGVwwjNVvJJVgJ2H4svzvgyGYou must know that the address currently contains 0.05BTC (~$950 at the moment.)

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Detritus on September 07, 2022, 06:27:36 PM Can anyone loan me $300 I will offer 1 BNB as coleteral~The collateral you offer does not cover the amount of the loan. If you do not have a credit history, you need to provide collateral that is equal or higher than the amount you are borrowing. Read the sticky topic.Quote from: DiamondCardz on April 20, 2014, 02:40:54 PMThe rule of "No Collateral, No Loan" means that in order to get a loan you must give collateral that is equal, or preferably higher to the amount you are being loaned.If you completely ignore this sticky and make a loan request with no collateral, without having massive trust on the forum, the chances of you getting negative trusted feedback and therefore having a Trade with Extreme Caution tag is almost 100%.

comments.author: Detritus
comments.created_time: September 07, 2022, 09:36:05 PMLast edit: September 07, 2022, 10:00:09 PM by Detritus
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on September 07, 2022, 07:27:51 PMAny chance you can sign a message from this address that (he'hem) you posted in 2011?Quote from: Detritus on July 17, 2011, 07:53:39 PM1D48JXC8hMZGVwwjNVvJJVgJ2H4svzvgyGYou must know that the address currently contains 0.05BTC (~$950 at the moment.)Is not possible to sign a message with that adress. Adress belongs to my friend who is into mining ⛏️. I can reduce my loan request to $200 with 1 BNB as coleteral.

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: I can lend you the $200 if you can provide the 1 BNB as collateral. 10% interest for 90 days, I'm free to sell the BNB if its value falls to $220 ($200+10%) and you can't pay the loan (at least partially) or provide more collateral.If you agree with the terms, send the 1 BNB to 0xc4419F4B31042c097767C505019783becFFb0987 (BSC chain!) and post or DM me your address (also, if you want in BTC or a specific stablecoin - i.e USDC/BUSD...).
